tool_description: OUTDATED: Please use our new API "Entity Detection & Linking"
name: Microfacts
title: Microfacts

api_list.name: Entity detection
api_list.description:
Named entities (e.g. persons, places, organisations, etc.) are found within the given text and additional info is provided for each entity (e.g. descriptions, images, position within the text. etc.).

Args:
  - text: The text to search
  - lang: The language of the text (optional)

Returns:
  - spots: The list of found entities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microfacts.p.rapidapi.com/v1/microfacts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microfacts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
